category.name: Data Management
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: AE_dataset_id_separator
preference.preference_description: Specifies the character used to separate the variables that form the dataset ID (item ID and sequence number) when a parent item or item revision is selected. For example, if the value is set to a dash (-), the selected item is UG001, and the next available sequence number for the dataset type (within the UG001) is 3, the dataset ID UG001-3 is generated. This preference is deprecated. Use the DisplayName business object constant to specify separators instead.
